backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing meeting session management, user profiles, panic events, audit logging, session recordings, and role-based access control with authorization mixins; includes CRUD operations for all entities with audit trail logging.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs; documents UI transformation work matching reference application layout, theming, card redesigns, and navigation updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including routing setup, React Query hooks, custom hooks, pages (landing, login, signup, dashboard pages), layout components, UI effects, and visualizer components with their key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, cards, borders, charts, and sidebar components using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, theme color, favicon references, Inter font preload, and root div mounting point for React application titled 'AXON SOVEREIGN'.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest configuring 'AXON Remote' as a standalone portrait mobile app with black theme, starting at /remote route, and icon assets at 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup with root route using Outlet pattern, defining all application routes (login, mobile, dashboard pages) wrapped in TelemetryProvider, GhostModeProvider, and ErrorBoundary with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuditLogVi: Displays a paginated, filterable table of audit logs with CSV export functionality. Fetches logs via useGetAuditLog hook and shows timestamp, action, user, status, and details for security-sensitive actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemHeal: Monitors backend system health metrics including cycles balance, heap/stable memory, and query/update call counts. Displays visual indicators with color-coded alerts when thresholds are exceeded.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Biomet: Renders a radar chart displaying five biometric metrics (executive stress, vocal stability, background noise, packet health, privacy score) with simulated real-time updates every 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Emotio: Displays a stacked area chart tracking seven emotion types (joy, surprise, fear, disgust, anger, sadness, neutral) over time with toggleable legend items and simulated data updates.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Global: Visualizes a global network map with four geographic nodes (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore) using SVG, showing animated pulse effects when nodes become active.
frontend/src/components/analytics/LiveTr: Renders a real-time area chart showing network traffic data that updates every 3 seconds with a sliding window of 20 data points.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Meetin: Displays a card component for a single meeting log showing title, duration, participant count, sentiment score, cost, and optional summary.
Shows a live-updating cost ticker that increments by ₹12.5 per second with pause/resume functionality to track meeting ROI in real-time.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Neural: Displays a real-time scrolling log of simulated security events (encryption, packet, neural, quantum) with random messages generated every 2-3 seconds, keeping the last 50 entries.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Quantu: Shows four metrics cards for quantum encryption status (key rotation rate, quantum resistance level, lattice crypto status, and post-quantum readiness percentage) with values updating every 8 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Recent: Renders a static table of recent files with columns for name, security level, status, and owner, using color-coded badges for security levels and statuses.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Sentim: Displays a live area chart tracking simulated vocal stress and emotional tension metrics over time, updating every 3 seconds with new data points.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Speake: Shows a list of four speakers with their vocal frequency ranges and activity levels displayed as animated progress bars that update every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/System: Displays an auto-scrolling terminal-style log of simulated system events across six categories (encrypt, sensory, auth, network, biometric, packet) with timestamps, generating new entries every 2-3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Threat: Renders a 4x4 grid of threat detection cells showing attack vectors across categories with color-coded severity levels and counts, updating every 5 seconds with simulated threat data.
frontend/src/components/analytics/VoiceP: Displays a timeline visualization of speaker voice patterns with segments showing speaker activity, volume, and timing across a 5-minute period. Includes interactive segment selection and real-time playback indicator.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPanel.t: Reusable authentication panel wrapper component with tactical glass styling, scanline overlay effects, and clickable AXON logo. Accepts children content and shake animation prop.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route guard component that checks for active session using local storage and redirects to login if unauthorized. Shows loading spinner during authentication check.
frontend/src/components/auth/RegisterVie: Registration form view with fields for full name, email, password, and password confirmation. Includes password visibility toggles and form validation handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Role-based route guard that verifies user permissions (admin or user) via API query and redirects to command center if access is denied. Shows loading state during permission verification.
Sign-in form with email/username and password fields, remember me checkbox, and social login buttons for Google and Facebook. Includes password visibility toggle.
frontend/src/components/auth/ThreeBackgr: Animated 3D background using Three.js with floating geometric shapes (cubes, spheres, toruses) that rotate and float over a radial gradient backdrop. Provides visual depth for authentication pages.
frontend/src/components/common/ActiveSta: Small status indicator component showing a pulsing green dot with tooltip displaying 'Status: Active'.
frontend/src/components/common/FeatureLo: Full-screen overlay modal that displays when a feature is locked, prompting users to upgrade to Shield tier subscription with pricing and upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/common/HotkeysRe: Modal dialog displaying searchable keyboard shortcuts organized by category (Security Protocols, Privacy Features, System Commands, Navigation). Opens with '?' key and closes with Escape.
frontend/src/components/common/MetricCar: Reusable card component for displaying metrics with an icon, title, value, and optional trend indicator (up/down arrow with percentage).
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryCT: Styled primary call-to-action button with emerald gradient, hover effects, and shadow animations.
frontend/src/components/common/SentinelP: Fixed floating panic button that triggers emergency protocol with confirmation dialog, terminates sessions, and navigates to sentinel dashboard.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Card displaying team members with avatars and roles, allowing admin to revoke access for individual users.
Card displaying the current subscription plan (Sovereign Enterprise) with badge and description.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AssetS: Card showing protected assets value in INR currency that auto-increments every 2 seconds to simulate real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contro: Card with toggle switches for Neural Shield and Stealth Mode security features, persisting state to sessionStorage and logging telemetry events.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Global: Card with animated canvas visualization showing pulsing global node locations (NYC, London, Tokyo) with emerald glow effects.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KPIMet: Grid of four metric cards displaying secured meetings, global nodes, threats neutralized (with bar chart), and health score (with radial chart).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Neural: A card component with URL input and verification button that validates meeting links, showing loading and verified states with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Displays system overview metrics including security health percentage, network stats (active sessions, neural efficiency), and team access data with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Pricin: Renders a three-tier pricing table (FREE, SOVEREIGN CORE ₹299/month, GLOBAL SHIELD ₹499/month) with feature lists and subscription management using useSubscriptionTier hook.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Quantu: Displays quantum interlink status information including microphone state (STANDBY), latency (14MS), and participant count (12).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickA: Provides quick action buttons for toggling ghost mode and performing tactical exit (logout with full session cleanup).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Securi: Renders a line chart showing security traffic volume trends over the last 7 days using recharts library.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Spectr: Displays an animated canvas-based waveform visualization with gradient effects to represent spectral analysis with a stable signal indicator.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Synops: Shows a loading state card for the synopsis engine that awaits a verified intelligence link before beginning analysis.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamMa: Manages team members with a list view showing status indicators and revoke access functionality for each member.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamSt: Displays a simple read-only list of team members with their current status (active/idle) indicated by colored dots.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Teleme: Displays a scrollable feed of telemetry events with color-coded types (success, warning, error) and timestamps, consuming events from TelemetryContext.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/VocalH: Renders a circular progress indicator showing vocal health score (98.4/100) with an SVG gradient ring and "Digital Twin" label.
frontend/src/components/dev/PerformanceO: Toggleable FPS monitor overlay (Ctrl+Shift+F) that measures frame rate using requestAnimationFrame and displays color-coded performance warnings.
frontend/src/components/effects/BorderBe: Animated border effect component that creates a moving gradient beam along the edges of its container using CSS animations.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sovereig: 3D rotating orb visualization with radial gradient, glow effects, and ripple animations on hover, representing a neural core.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorBoun: React error boundary class component that catches errors and displays a styled error card with retry and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/layout/BentoCard: Reusable card wrapper component with optional BorderBeam effect, backdrop blur, and custom styling for bento grid layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, user profile display, subscription tier badges, logout functionality, and conditional feature access based on subscription level.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with four-column grid layout containing brand info, product links, resources, legal links, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Button component with magnetic attraction effect that translates position based on mouse proximity using custom useMousePosition hook with configurable magnetic strength and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/mobile/Biometric: Interactive biometric authentication component supporting fingerprint and face ID scanning modes with animated progress, haptic feedback, and simulated success/error states.
frontend/src/components/neural/AIMirrorS: Displays the readiness status of an AI voice twin/neural proxy with visual indicators (checkmark or spinner) and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/neural/NeuralPro: Circular progress indicator with gradient stroke showing synthesis progress percentage using SVG.
frontend/src/components/neural/VocalDrop: Drag-and-drop file upload zone for audio files with visual feedback, file validation, and display of uploaded audio file details.
frontend/src/components/neural/VoiceHeal: Dashboard displaying voice quality metrics (pitch stability, clarity index, tone quality) with icons and gradient progress bars.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Secur: Calendar-based booking interface for scheduling security audit calls with date picker, time slot selection, and confirmation functionality.
frontend/src/components/security/DarkWeb: Real-time dark web threat monitoring dashboard with auto-generated threats, filtering by type/severity, severity statistics, and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Acousti: Grid of selectable environment cards (office, jet, airport, etc.) for acoustic masking with active/inactive states and visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Environ: Audio mixer interface with volume sliders for eight different environmental soundscapes (office, rain, cafe, etc.) for tactical audio masking.
Displays a grid of environment audio spoofing options (office, cafe, airport, etc.) with toggle functionality to activate/deactivate background audio for each environment.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Hardwar: Provides buttons to trigger fake OS update screens (Windows 11 and macOS) in fullscreen overlay mode with dismiss functionality.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PacketJ: Simulates network degradation with a slider to control jitter level, displaying calculated quality, latency, and packet loss metrics with a Ctrl+Shift+L hotkey.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PanicPr: Displays a fullscreen fake Windows update screen with progress bar as a panic mode overlay, dismissible via Ctrl+Shift+Q hotkey.
frontend/src/components/settings/Bandwid: Allows users to select streaming quality presets (low/medium/high/ultra) with live bandwidth usage meter and savings calculation, persisting selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/sync/ConnectionL: Displays a scrollable terminal-style log of WebSocket connection events, authentication, and Diffie-Hellman key exchange messages with simulated periodic updates.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Renders a testimonial card with avatar, name, title, 5-star rating, and quote text with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Neur: Displays a fullscreen loading transition with AXON logo, progress bar, and scan line animation that completes at 100% before calling onComplete callback.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Page: Simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to its children for page transitions.
frontend/src/components/vault/IntelSessi: Displays a meeting log card with collapsible analysis (sentiment, cost) and transcript sections, showing session metadata like duration and participant count.
frontend/src/components/vault/Subscripti: Displays a single subscription tier card with pricing, features list, and selection button. Supports free, core, and shield tiers with monthly/yearly pricing toggle and visual selection state with BorderBeam effect.

Manages subscription tier selection (free/core/shield) with monthly/yearly toggle, persists selection to localStorage, and displays three SubscriptionTierCard components with predefined feature lists.
Provides a toggle switch for monthly vs yearly billing with visual feedback and a "Save 20%" label for yearly plans.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoWelco: Floating video widget with play/pause, minimize/maximize, and close controls. Displays an operator briefing thumbnail with playback simulation and can be minimized to a small button in the corner.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Netwo: 3D globe visualization using Three.js showing global network nodes with latency-based color coding and animated connection arcs between nodes. Updates latency values every 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Neura: Canvas-based animated waveform visualizer displaying two overlapping sine waves with different frequencies and colors to simulate real-time audio frequency analysis.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Water: Canvas-based waterfall spectrogram that scrolls frequency bars downward over time, creating a cascading visualization of audio frequency intensity with neon green coloring.
frontend/src/contexts/GhostModeContext.t: React context provider for managing ghost mode state, persisting the boolean flag to sessionStorage and providing a toggle function to components.
frontend/src/contexts/TelemetryContext.t: React context provider for logging and managing telemetry events with timestamps, message types (info/success/warning/error), and a maximum of 50 stored events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance using React Query, handling authentication with Internet Identity and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Provides a hook for triggering haptic feedback with light, medium, and heavy vibration patterns using the navigator.vibrate API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication for ICP, providing a React context and hooks for login, logout, identity management, and authentication status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.t: Hook that listens for keyboard shortcuts and triggers a callback when all specified keys are pressed simultaneously, supporting modifier keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useMousePosition.ts: Tracks mouse position relative to the center of a referenced HTML element, returning x and y coordinates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, roles, meeting logs, panic protocol, audit logs, and system health metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscriptionTier.t: Manages subscription tier state (free/core/shield) in localStorage and provides computed properties for feature access based on tier level.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming, utility classes for glass effects and scanlines, and keyframe animations for UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for user management, audit logs, and system health monitoring, displaying current user profile and role information.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsVault.tsx: Displays archived meeting logs in a grid layout with subscription tier information, showing loading states and empty states when no sessions exist.
frontend/src/pages/CommandCenter.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays an overview, KPI metrics, neural ingest input, synopsis engine, and spectral analysis (gated by subscription tier). Uses a responsive grid layout with gradient background.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceSync.tsx: Device synchronization page that displays a QR code for pairing mobile devices and shows a connection log. Provides a pairing URL for tactical remote control.
frontend/src/pages/DevMetrics.tsx: Developer metrics dashboard showing system health including cycles balance, heap/stable memory usage with real-time charts, and critical threshold alerts. Displays performance data in TC (trillion cycles) and MB units.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, feature grid showcasing security capabilities (Sentinel Protocol, encryption, neural network, etc.), testimonials, and social media links. Includes CTA buttons for login/demo.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Authentication page handling Internet Identity login flow and first-time user profile setup. Shows loading states during initialization and prompts new users to enter their name before accessing the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/MobileBiometric.tsx: Mobile-specific biometric authentication page with a back button and BiometricScanner component. Simple layout for mobile device authentication flow.
frontend/src/pages/NeuralLab.tsx: Voice cloning and synthesis interface with persona specification input, vocal sample upload, neural synthesis progress tracking, voice health dashboard, and AI mirror status. Includes background image and synthesis simulation with progress bar.
frontend/src/pages/SentinelProtocol.tsx: Renders the Sentinel Protocol page with tactical countermeasures including acoustic matrix, panic mode button, environment mixer, spoofing, packet jitter simulator, and hardware mimicry components. Includes subscription tier access control and panic protocol activation.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Simple settings page that displays the BandwidthOptimizer component for performance and bandwidth optimization controls.
frontend/src/pages/Subscriptions.tsx: Displays three subscription tiers (Free, Sovereign Core ₹299, Global Shield ₹499) with feature lists and allows users to select/upgrade their plan with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/TacticalRemote.tsx: Mobile-optimized tactical remote interface with large touch buttons for panic mode, lag simulation, environment spoofing, and biometric scanning, featuring haptic feedback integration.
frontend/src/pages/TeamManagementPage.ts: Team management page that displays the ActiveIdentitiesCard component for managing team members and access levels.
frontend/src/pages/UnifiedDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard with sidebar navigation for Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, and Vault sections. Displays user profile, subscription tier, and various feature cards including asset shield, neural ingest, vocal health, spectral analysis, synopsis engine, and pricing table.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageAuth.ts: Provides localStorage-based authentication utilities with basic encryption/decryption for user management, including registration, sign-in, session handling, and subscription plan tracking across multiple storage keys (AXON_USERS, AXON_SESSION, AXON_MASTER_USER).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, font families, and custom animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting the AXON Sovereign dashboard application with five existing features focused on transforming the CommandCenter page to match a reference application's layout, colors, cards, navigation, and responsive behavior.
